item.title: Children of Time
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/children-of-time.jpg'); } Children of Time. Adrian Tchaikovsky. ISBN: 978-1-4472-7328-8 . Accessed Dec 27, 2025. Snapshots from the Humans Storyline Dr. Avrana Kern reminds me of ruthless pragmatists common in dystopian motion pictures, e.g., Boy Wonder in “Alien: Earth”, Evelyn Maddox in “The Ark”, etc. gives us her point-of-view that we don’t typically get in film & movies. “This is where mankind takes its next great step.
